item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, February 21, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:

12. Five Kinds of Nondeterminism (75 points | 16 comments)

16. Exa Laboratories (YC S24) Is Hiring a Founding Engineer to Build AI Chips ( | hide)

29. I put my heart and soul into this AI but nobody cares (161 points | 75 comments)
30. Lox – Oxidized Astrodynamics – A safe, ergonomic astrodynamics library (103 points | 39 comments)
